title: Pixel 2, Wifi disabled, Mobile network disabled, unable to turn them back on.
content:
My Pixel 2, 64 gb, starts acting weird everytime there is a system update available. 

The Wifi and Mobile Network are disabled. I can't turn them back on. The Wifi switch just slides back to off position. 

This is annoying because I can't back up anything. I can't download the update to install it. 

It happened 3 times now. This is the 3rd time. 

When I restart the phone, then it starts acting very sluggish. The phone responds very slowly. Still the wifi and mobile network remain disabled.

I restarted it in safe mode, reset network settings, did a factory reset,  but the problem remains the same.

Somehow it starts working again after 5-6 hrs. But this time it didn't.
